commit.message:
Support $SYSROOT for = in -I etc.

	* incpath.c (add_sysroot_to_chain): Allow for $SYSROOT prefix.
	* doc/cppdiropts.texi (-I @var{dir}): Document it.

From-SVN: r249560

+	* doc/cppdiropts.texi (-I @var{dir}): Document it.
